Class Services<T extends DomainObject,K>

java.lang.Object
CSC540.WolfWR.services.Services<T,K>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity class, which extends DomainObject.
K - the type of the primary key of the entity.
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiscountService, MemberService, MerchandiseService, SignUpService, StaffService, StoreService, SupplierService, TransactionService
public abstract class Services<T extends DomainObject,K> extends Object
A generic service class that provides common CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for entities that extend DomainObject.

This abstract class is designed to be inherited by specific service classes, providing functionality to interact with the database via a JpaRepository. It provides methods to save, find, and delete entities using the repository.

See Also:
  • DomainObject
  • JpaRepository

      public Services()

  • Method Details

    • getRepo

      protected abstract org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<T,K> getRepo()
      Returns the repository associated with the entity class Services.

      This is an abstract method, and must be implemented by subclasses to return the specific repository for the entity class.

      Returns:
      the JpaRepository for the entity class Services.

    • save

      public void save(T entity)
      Saves a single entity to the database.

      This method saves the given entity using the JpaRepository.saveAndFlush(Object) method, which persists the entity and immediately flushes the changes to the database.

      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to be saved.

    • saveAll

      public void saveAll(Iterable<T> entities)
      Saves a list of entities to the database.

      This method saves all entities from the provided iterable using the JpaRepository.saveAllAndFlush(Iterable) method, which persists the entities and immediately flushes the changes to the database.

      Parameters:
      entities - the iterable collection of entities to be saved.

    • findByID

      public T findByID(K id)
      Finds an entity by its ID.

      This method uses the CrudRepository.findById(Object) method to fetch an entity by its primary key. If the entity is found, it is returned; otherwise, null is returned.

      Parameters:
      id - the primary key of the entity to be found.
      Returns:
      the entity with the given ID, or null if not found.

    • findAll

      public List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all entities of the given type.

      This method uses the ListCrudRepository.findAll() method to fetch all entities of type Services from the database.

      Returns:
      a list of all entities of type Services.

    • delete

      public void delete(T obj)
      Deletes the specified entity from the database.

      This method uses the CrudRepository.delete(Object) method to remove the given entity from the database.

      Parameters:
      obj - the entity to be deleted.

    • deleteList

      public void deleteList(List<T> objs)
      Deletes a list of entities from the database.

      This method uses the CrudRepository.deleteAll(Iterable) method to remove the provided list of entities from the database.

      Parameters:
      objs - the list of entities to be deleted.
